header.title: DPH Opioid Report
header.subtitle: The Massachusetts Department of Public Health collects overdose death data to track the progression of the opioid crisis and target services to especially hard-hit communities. The data in this report is updated quarterly.

body.description: overview of the emergency incidents goes here
paragraphs: County heat map with the percentages. Tooltip would have numeric value when you hover. There’s a lot of other info in that table that could be put into a sidebar and would be active if you click or search for a county (it could default to the state totals at first). Could be similar to the format for the other map.
